name: Court Costs including Alimony and Child Support
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Local, state, and federal courts of law that administer and process
court fees (such as case administration costs and litigation
processing fees), alimony, and child support payments.
For merchants that process fines or penalties associated with the
court system, use MCC 9222.
